column3: <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>A particular martial stance is required to execute, or apply the additional effects of, these actions.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Actions that increase progress or efficiency.
Actions that increase quality or efficiency.
Supplemental actions that affect durability or CP.
Actions available when equipped with a crafter soul crystal.
